title: Actor Derek Martin from EastEnders Passes Away at 92
summary: Derek Martin, an actor famous for playing Charlie Slater on the TV show EastEnders, has died at age 92. He started acting in the 1960s and joined EastEnders in 2000, where he was a main character until 2011. His character was a widower with four daughters and was part of many big stories on the show. Martin was born in London and worked in factories and as a butcher before becoming an actor. His family and agent said he was a kind father and friend who will be missed. EastEnders also shared that he was loved by everyone who worked with him. He appeared in other TV shows too, like Doctor Who and The Sweeney, even though he had no acting training. Martin died on a Saturday, and people remember him as a good man who helped others.
